TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RC2CryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.RC2
Public NotInheritable Class RC2CryptoServiceProvider Inherits RC2
public ref class RC2CryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RC2

summary.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现支持增量为 8 位的密钥长度为 40 位至 128 位。The implementation supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits. 对象是一种块密码进行加密和解密的 8 个字节的块中的数据。The object is a block cipher that encrypts and decrypts data in blocks of 8 bytes. 此类来填充数据最终块，如果它是不超过 8 个字节。This class pads the final block of data if it is less than 8 bytes. 填充后，加密数据的长度可能大于原始纯文本。As a result of this padding, the length of encrypted data could be greater than the original plaintext. 请注意，对象不使用 salt。Note that the object does not use salt. > [!NOTE] > 较新的对称加密算法，高级加密标准 (AES)，是可用的。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 请考虑使用算法和而不是其派生的类类。Consider using the algorithm and its derived classes instead of the class. 使用仅为与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行加密，然后解密字符串。The following code example encrypts and then decrypts a string. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to create a key with an 11-byte-long, zero-value salt.

span.span: if the key should be created with an 11-byte-long, zero-value salt; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你与使用 11 字节长的零值的 salt 的现有应用程序进行互操作。The property allows you to interoperate with an existing application that uses an 11-byte-long, zero-value salt. 大多数情况下，你不应使用与 salt密钥。For most scenarios, you should not use a salt with an key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性`true`，然后进行加密和解密值。The following code example sets the property to `true`, and then encrypts and decrypts a value. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider/cpp/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider/VB/example.vb#1)]
